summary: Gnocchi are Italian dumplings made with flour, potato, egg, and salt. They can be flavored with cheese, herbs, or vegetables. These dumplings are cooked in boiling water and served with sauces like butter and sage or pesto. Gnocchi can be a first course or a side dish. They can be made at home or bought from stores, and they come in different forms, including small ones for soup.
title: Gnocchi
